neurotools.signal.linenoise module¶

neurotools.signal.linenoise.band_stop_line_noise_removal(lfps)[source]¶

removes line noise using band-stop at 60Hz and overtones

neurotools.signal.linenoise.virtual_reference_line_noise_removal(lfps)[source]¶

Accepts an array of LFP recordings (first dimension should be channel number, second dimension time ). Sample rate assumed 1000Hz

Extracts the mean signal within 2.5 Hz of 60Hz. For each channel, removes the projection of the LFP signal onto this estimated line noise signal.

Note: for some reason this doesn’t always work that well.
